amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that products derived from tar sands are crude oil for purposes of the Federal excise tax on petroleum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 27, under the order of 1/22/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 19.

action.text: Amendment SA 27 proposed by Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S335-336; text: CR S335) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that products derived from tar sands are crude oil for purposes of the Federal excise tax on petroleum.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 27, under the order of 1/22/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 19.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 27, under the order of 1/22/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 19.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 27 proposed by Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2.
